content:
Hi all! I have a bunch of PRs needing review
Particularly, the following might be interesting to specific team members:
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/71217 - [small] @pnkfelix who wrote the original FIXME being removed
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/71311 - [tiny] easy PR fixing output
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/71338 - [medium] PR trying to fix very confusing output around recursive opaque types, but that needs some review love, @varkor might be interested
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/71481 - [small] behavioral change that will let us do https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/71482 and make the output when we point at spans in the std lib much more readable
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/71451 - [small] add appropriate suggestion when missing super trait
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/71108 and https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/70908 - [big] add suggestions for associated type errors
I'll try to take a look at any that haven't been reviewed before too long, though it may take until the weekend before I have a chance. (Ping me again if I forget.)
